TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː s t ɛ l ɐ æ s oʊ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ d iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ v h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m n ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v f ɪ ɡ s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ᵻ ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ s n eɪ k n ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oːɹ f ɹ ɑː k f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː t iː ɹ ɛ k b eɪ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə tʃ ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
